MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a unplanned power cut in the CH45 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Withens Lane, Bridgecroft Road and surrounding streets. Our engineers are making progress with the repair on the underground cable network and are still working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:39PM on 18th October 2020.
